catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 475
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed image of Fudo-Myoo; fierce looking figure with grimacing face; one snaggle tooth is pointed upward, another points downward; one eye looks down, while the other one is rolled upward; standing in powerful pose holding sword in PR hand and a rope in PL hand; flames behind
title: Fudo Myoo
